info.description:
# MCP Server Management UI
This app provides a native Nextcloud interface for managing your MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server.
## Features
- **User Settings**: View session information, manage background access permissions - **Admin Settings**: Monitor server status, vector sync metrics - **Vector Visualization**: Interactive semantic search with 2D PCA visualization - **Webhook Management**: Configure and enable webhook presets (admin only)
## Requirements
- Nextcloud MCP Server running in OAuth mode with Management API enabled - Configure `mcp_server_url` and `mcp_server_api_key` in config.php
See [documentation](https://github.com/cbcoutinho/nextcloud-mcp-server/blob/master/docs/ADR-018-nextcloud-php-app-for-settings-ui.md) for details.
